global_param.name: ENABLE_USERS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable Users]
global_param.description: Activate the users management system to protect your AjaXplorer installation.

global_param.name: ALLOW_GUEST_BROWSING
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Guest Browsing]
global_param.description: Enable the 'guest' user, who does not need to log in.

global_param.name: PASSWORD_MINLENGTH
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Password length]
global_param.description: Minimum number of characters required for passwords in the application

global_param.name: SESSION_SET_CREDENTIALS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Store Credentials in Session]
global_param.description: Set the users credentials in the session after a successful login, this can be necessary when bridging specific auth and access plugins.
